text: Robert Gilliland BeckelThe Five, March 10, 2014 https://archive.org/details/FOXNEWSW_20140310_210000_The_Five#start/3540/end/3600 (November 15, 1948 â€“ February 21, 2022) was an American political analyst and pundit. He was a former analyst and commentator on Fox News. He co-hosted The Five until he was released in 2015. Beckel later became a commentator for CNN. In 2017, he returned to Fox News as a co-host of The Five. A few months later, he was fired after he was accused of making a racist comment against an employee. Beckel died on February 21, 2022, at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American columnists Category:American political commentators Category:American television presenters Category:Fox News people Category:CNN people Category:Journalists from New York City Category:Television personalities from New York City
title: Bob Beckel
